name: An Art Game Where You Explore A Dismal Hallway - Forever
name_original: An Art Game Where You Explore A Dismal Hallway - Forever
description:
Open presents, collect coins, and talk to strangers in a dismal hallway! You can literally play forever in this "endless walker." Can you collect all three hats?

Click the screen to start the game, use the arrow keys to control the character.

Concept generated by the Insanity Game Jam idea generator - http://www.insanityjam.com/idea/

Enjoy this "art game"? Please consider donating $1 or more by clicking the "Support This Art Game" button.
